appendix.title: Achieving PCI-DSS Compliance
appendix.para: If credit card data is processed at your site, it can be necessary to follow the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard (PCI-DSS). This appendix will help you implement the portions of the standard that relate to the operating system and the network configuration.

note.title: PCI-DSS is site-specific
note.para: The implementation of PCI-DSS happens on a site-by-site basis. A general blueprint cannot be given within this guide.
